effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 780,008 damage to your primary target and 133,550 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Focus excess Azerite energy into the Heart of Azeroth, then expel that energy outward, dealing 829 Fire damage to all enemies in front of you over 2.3 sec. Castable while moving.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your damaging spells and abilities grant you 2 Haste for 4 sec, stacking up to 10 times. This Haste is lost if you stop using spells or abilities against the initial target.

When you have no stacks of Focused Energy, generate 3 stacks from your first damaging spell or ability.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to generate an Icicle, heal you for 127, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

MOTHER has added a Purification Protocol to your Heart of Azeroth, allowing your damaging spells and abilities to release a blast of Azerite energy at your target, dealing 78 Fire damage to any enemy within 8 yds, and heals you for 28 every 2 sec for 8 sec.

Purification Protocol deals 50% additional damage against Aberrations.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

If your target is below 20% health, the chance for extra damage is increased by 400%.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 715,254 damage to your primary target and 142,569 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:

Festive Red Holiday Shorts

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Removes any loss of control effect with a duration of 5 seconds or more. This effect can only occur once every 1 min.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
